Detailed Description

Certificate verifier.

Verifies certificate chains, gets verified certificates.

virtual IPublicEncryptorCertificate* DRMPlugin::ICertVerifier::VerifyChainGetEncryptorCertificate (  const ByteSeq &  root,
const std::vector< ByteSeq > &  chain
)  [pure virtual]
 

Verify certificate chain.

Assume that the chain starts with a certificate issued by root. If successful, return encryptor certificate from the last certificate.

Parameters:
root input, root certificate.
chain input, certificate chain, ending with certificate to verify.
Returns:
Verified public key encryptor certificate. If zero, failed.

Verify certificate chain.
